page.title: 09HOME LIFE THE BAD SIDE
page.content: They say we must not; be noisy, fight, run in other peoples gardens, torment each other, break toys, answer back, make a mess, touch things, run about in the house, kick the ball against the wall, climb the bannisters, do handstands up the wall, jump on the bed, lean out of windows, play loud music, help ourselves to quick snacks, argue. They say we must; clean our teeth,wash behind our ears, be tidy, look after the young ones, dry up, go to bed, make tea, come home early, save our money, be polite, behave ourselves. If not perhaps; we get a smack, get sent to bed, get slippered, no pocket money, stay indoors, no sweets, no treats.
